page.title: 11International Folk Festival.
page.content: This year Sidmouth will hold its 31st. annual{International Folklore {Festival.}It is{Britain's biggest {festival of folksong, dance and music and features many of the best artists from home and abroad with over 300 events this year. Dance teams have been invited from many countries, including{the Seychelles, India, {Egypt and Yugoslavia. There are many things going on throughout the day and plenty of action during the evening ranging from singing and street theatre to dancing and musicians of all types. Perhaps one of the most spectacular combined performances of the week is when a torchlight procession comes from each end of the bay and meets on the seafront beach where the torches are extinguished. This ends each year's performance.
